intro: This document serves as a comprehensive guide for creating technical documentation within the Copernicus Land Monitoring Service (CLMS), leveraging the capabilities of Quarto. It provides step-by-step instructions for producing well-structured, consistent, and professional-quality documents. Covering aspects from initial software setup and project integration to Markdown syntax, document rendering, and the review process, this guide aims to empower users to effectively contribute to the CLMS Technical Library, ensuring clarity and accessibility of technical information.
